modifiers.name: Seriously Calamity-Prone
modifiers.notes: Each level reduces the number of Excess Points (default: 5) which give a +1 bonus on Calamity rolls by 1.

modifiers.name: Slower Magical Recovery
modifiers.notes: Each level subtracts -25% from your Recharge Rate (default: 8 -2/lvl).

23e1c3ba-04dd-4c78-831d-d89eaa5eac15.name: Increased Threshold
23e1c3ba-04dd-4c78-831d-d89eaa5eac15.notes: You can cast longer without needing to roll for Calamity. Increases Thresh by 20%/lvl (default: Thr 30 +6/lv)

90517ec9-43d0-41c0-acf4-33d0aaaa6cf7.name: Safer Magical Excess
90517ec9-43d0-41c0-acf4-33d0aaaa6cf7.notes: You tend to produce less severe calamities. Each level doubles the number of excess Tally Points (default: 5) that will give +1 to Calamity rolls.

3bf881a0-e02c-4434-988d-7f74b4c1a5f8.name: Rapid Magical Recovery
3bf881a0-e02c-4434-988d-7f74b4c1a5f8.notes: You recover faster from spellcasting. Each level adds +25% to your Recharge Rate (default: RR 8 +2/lvl).
